history.proof: intros. unfold continuous. hauto l: on depth: 3use: filterlim_comp, locally.

exceptions.tactic: apply filterlim_comp with (f := f) (g := g) (F := locally x); auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment U, V, W : UniformSpace f : U -> V g : V -> W x : U H : continuous f x H0 : continuous g (f x) Cf : W -> Prop Cg : locally (g (f x)) Cf Unable to unify "forall P : W -> Prop, ?M2370 P -> filtermap (fun x : U => g (f x)) (locally x) P" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : U, ball x eps y -> (fun x : U => Cf ((fun x0 : U => g (f x0)) x)) y".

original: intros. unfold continuous. intros Cf Cg. apply filterlim_comp with (f := f) (g := g) (F := locally x); auto.
